Package eu.tivian.hardware

Class Bus

java.lang.Object
eu.tivian.hardware.Bus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Pin>
public class Bus
extends Object
implements Iterable<Pin>
An implementation of collection of pins. Usually called the bus.
Since:
2019-11-06
Author:
Pawe≈Ç Kania
See Also:
Pin

    • direction

      public void direction​(long direction)
      Changes the direction of the bus, pin by pin.
      Parameters:
      direction - each bit represents either output (1) or input (0)

    • dirValue

      public long dirValue()
      Translates direction of all pins to bits.

      bit representation of pin directions
